meanings.definition: Cause (a process or action) to begin.
meanings.sent1: The teacher initiates the class discussion every morning.
meanings.sent2: She initiates the project by outlining the steps to follow.
meanings.sent3: The curious cat initiates a game of chase with the butterfly.
meanings.sent4: The first raindrop initiates a downpour of water from the sky.
meanings.sent5: The alarm clock initiates the start of a new day for many people.

meanings.definition: A person who has been initiated into an organization or activity.
meanings.sent1: The new member is an initiate in the book club.
meanings.sent2: She became an initiate of the secret society last week.
meanings.sent3: The young initiate was eager to learn the club's handshake.
meanings.sent4: The initiate quickly adapted to the group's traditions and customs.
meanings.sent5: The initiate's enthusiasm brought a fresh energy to the team.
